name: Optimal Blue
overview:
Optimal Blue, LLC is an international technology and content provider catering to investors, lenders and originators. Having pioneered the concept and created the first internet-based product and pricing engine in the 90′s, the founders of Optimal Blue have leveraged their experience to develop the most accurate and effective secondary marketing automation platform on the market today.

Based in Plano, Texas, Optimal Blue, LLC is an international technology and content provider catering to investors, lenders and originators. Having pioneered the concept and created the first internet-based product and pricing engine in the 90′s, the founders of Optimal Blue have leveraged their experience to develop the most accurate and effective secondary marketing automation platform on the market today.

Our team of dedicated, intelligent and mortgage-savvy individuals are committed to ensuring every experience you have with us exceeds your expectations. As a nimble, privately held enterprise, we are able to respond quickly to changes in the marketplace. This flexibility has allowed us to keep up with the incredible pace of change the industry has endured during the course of the past year.

Today, with hundreds of lenders across the US and UK leveraging our services to manage their secondary marketing department requirements and deliver more margin from their business, we have proven to be the most reliable, accurate and trustworthy source for product pricing and eligibility solutions.

Having created the first Internet-based product eligibility and pricing engine solution in the late 1990′s, when they founded Optimal Blue in 2002, Ivan and Larry had the luxury of experience and hindsight to ensure success. Leveraging next generation technology, they focused on three key factors:

• Accurate and real-time content • Fast, reliable and flexible technology • Brilliant customer service

The implementation of Optimal Blue’s internal Six Sigma program, labeled “5-Nines” (99.999% accurate) has produced virtually error-free content. Optimal Blue is the only platform with a real-time error capture, reporting and resolution tracking system, which enables the company to effectively benchmark errors every month, and thereby prove its 99.999 percent accuracy.

Optimal Blue’s platform allows lenders to leverage technology to automate pipeline management and loan searches, and consumers and originators to price and lock loans in real time. Our platform offers the highest customization available in the market. Add to that, tremendous efficiencies coupled with ease-of-use, it is evident that no other provider can match Optimal Blue’s performance and ability to drive profits for mortgage lenders, banks and credit unions.

funding_rounds.source_description: Optimal Blue Receives Private Equity Investment from Serent Capital
